author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom wall painting tips #ad…I always prime bare drywall and like using @kilzbrand KILZ 2 All-Purpose Primer. I roll that on my drywall repair and allow it to cure. Then, I use @magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Classic Interior Paint in the color Yarn, which is available for purchase on Amazon. I cut into the ceiling with an angled-sash brush, then back roll for a smooth finish. Many thanks to #kilz for helping my client upgrade their bathroom 👍🏽🔥#everyprojectisworthit
title: Bathroom Wall Painting Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #ad
